```{r}
if (!require("pacman"))
  install.packages("pacman")

pacman::p_load(tidyverse,
               giscoR,
               janitor,
               s2)

germany_districts <- gisco_get_nuts(
  country = 'Germany',
  nuts_level = 3,
  year = "2021",
  epsg = 3035) |>
    as_tibble() |>
    clean_names() 

germany_states <- gisco_get_nuts(
  country = 'Germany',
  nuts_level = 1,
  year = "2021",
  epsg = 3035) |>
    as_tibble() |>
    clean_names() 
```


```{r}
germany_districts |>
  ggplot(aes (geometry = geometry)) +
  geom_sf()

```
